content:
What I’ve been up to lately: Overall anti-AI hype, pro-machine-learning development.
Recent research needed a centralized place to be categorized, so see below:
List of current areas of focus: Bias Correction in LM-Generated Content Agentic Counterfactual Correction in LM-Generated Content Logical Fallacy Correction for News and LM-Generated Content Ping me to discuss; shoot me a note at jonathan.bennion [at] gmail to connect.
summary:

Overall anti-AI hype, pro-machine-learning development.

Ping me to discuss; shoot me a note at jonathan.bennion [at] gmail to connect.
title: Jonathan Bennion - SemiUpdated Current Projects
